response.original_title: Wang Leehom 2008 Sony Ericsson MUSIC-MAN World Tour
response.overview: With his trailblazing music, Leehom performs super-heroics as the guitar-toting Music-Man! The Taiwan pop king's Music-Man World Tour took off at the Taipei Arena in September 2008, and subsequently conquered fans in China, Southeast Asia, and the United States. Now, Music-Man's faithful followers can relive the experience anytime with this highly anticipated live recording. Filmed in Full HD, the Blu-ray set contains 150 minutes of concert performances with over 30 songs (including hits from Leehom's latest album Heart Beat), as well as 40 minutes of behind-the-scenes footage.
response.title: Wang Leehom 2008 Sony Ericsson MUSIC-MAN World Tour
